spatial_accuracy.notes: Bathroom is significantly larger in the render. Closet next to Hall is almost double in size compared to the floor plan. The Laundry room appears to be wider. Overall room proportions are distorted. Door to Bedroom 2 is missing. Door from hall to bathroom is incorrectly placed.

structural_fidelity.notes: Walls in the kitchen/dining area and hall are significantly thicker than other walls. Wall separating Laundry from Kitchen/Dining is missing. Wall separating the two closets and the hall is missing, replaced by an open entryway. A small wall section is missing near the entrance to Bedroom 1. The small closet next to the entrance is missing. The laundry room is missing walls and its door. The closet next to the bathroom is missing a door.

furniture_mapping.notes: Furniture in the laundry room is missing. Couch in the living room is not correctly oriented. Dining table shape is not preserved. Furniture in Bedroom 2 is not accurately represented.

aesthetic_quality.notes: Isometric camera and orthographic projection are generally good. Lighting quality is decent. Geometry is mostly clean, but some minor distortions are present, especially with wall thicknesses. Visual clarity is good.

detected_errors.description: Bathroom proportion heavily distorted, appearing much larger.
Closet next to Hall proportion distorted, appears much larger.
Laundry room appears wider than in the floor plan.
Door from Hall to Bathroom is incorrectly placed.
Kitchen/Dining and Hall interior walls show inconsistent thickness compared to other walls.
Wall separating Laundry from Kitchen/Dining is missing.
Wall separating the two closets and the hall is missing, replaced by an open entry.
Small wall section missing near entrance to Bedroom 1.
The small closet next to the entrance is entirely missing.
Laundry room is missing walls on one side and its door.
Closet next to the bathroom is missing a door.
Furniture in the laundry room is entirely missing.
Couch in the living room is not oriented correctly facing the TV wall.
Dining table shape is oval in the render, but rectangular in the floor plan.
Furniture in Bedroom 2 is different from the floor plan (e.g., bed, additional closet/dresser).
Minor geometry distortions on some walls, appearing thicker than intended without consistency.
